snippet: Professor Marcus was esteemed for her advances in the traditionally male-dominated field of logic, long one of philosophy’s most swaggering strains.
abstract: Ruth Barcan Marcus, acclaimed philosopher of logic, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Professor Marcus was esteemed for her advances in the traditionally male-dominated field of logic, long one of philosophy’s most swaggering strains.

headline.seo: Ruth Barcan Marcus, Philosopher and Logician, Dies at 90
headline.main: Ruth Barcan Marcus, Philosopher-Logician, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Ruth Barcan Marcus, 90, Acclaimed Philosopher of Logic
